exceptions.exn: In environment H1 : forall (f g : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => f u v = g u v) x y -> continuity_2d_pt f x y -> continuity_2d_pt g x y f, g : R -> R -> R n : nat x, y : R H1_1 : posreal H1_2 : forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < H1_1 -> Rabs (v - y) < H1_1 -> f u v = g u v H : continuity_2d_pt f x y H3 : ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f z v) u) n x y H5 : ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f u z) v) n x y x0 : R H6 : forall x1 : R, is_filter_lim (locally y) x1 -> Equiv.is_domin (locally y) (fun y : R => minus y x1) (fun y : R => minus (minus (f x y) (f x x1)) (scal (minus y x1) x0)) linear_plus : forall x y : R, scal (plus x y) x0 = plus (scal x x0) (scal y x0) linear_scal : forall k x : R, scal (scal k x) x0 = scal k (scal x x0) x1 : R H4 : 0 < x1 H7 : forall x : R, norm (scal x x0) <= x1 * norm x x2 : R H8 : forall x0 : R, is_filter_lim (locally x) x0 -> Equiv.is_domin (locally x) (fun y : R => minus y x0) (fun y0 : R => minus (minus (f y0 y) (f x0 y)) (scal (minus y0 x0) x2)) linear_plus0 : forall x y : R, scal (plus x y) x2 = plus (scal x x2) (scal y x2) linear_scal0 : forall k x : R, scal (scal k x) x2 = scal k (scal x x2) x3 : R H2 : 0 < x3 H9 : forall x : R, norm (scal x x2) <= x3 * norm x Unable to unify "match n with | 0%nat => ?M12969 x = ?M12972 | S n => is_derive (Derive_n ?M12969 n) x ?M12972 end" with "forall eps : posreal, locally_2d (fun u v : R => Rabs (g u v - g x y) < eps) x y".

exceptions.exn: In environment S : Set H10 : forall (f g : S -> S -> S) (x y : S), locally_2d (fun u v : S => f u v = g u v) x y -> continuity_2d_pt f x y -> continuity_2d_pt g x y H1 : forall (f g : R -> R) (n : nat) (x l : R), (forall t : R, f t = g t) -> is_derive_n f n x l -> is_derive_n g n x l H0 : forall (f g : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => f u v = g u v) x y -> continuity_2d_pt f x y -> continuity_2d_pt g x y f, g : R -> R -> R n : nat x, y : R H1_1 : posreal H1_2 : forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < H1_1 -> Rabs (v - y) < H1_1 -> f u v = g u v H : continuity_2d_pt f x y H3 : ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f z v) u) n x y H5 : ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f u z) v) n x y x0 : R H6 : forall x1 : R, is_filter_lim (locally y) x1 -> Equiv.is_domin (locally y) (fun y : R => minus y x1) (fun y : R => minus (minus (f x y) (f x x1)) (scal (minus y x1) x0)) linear_plus : forall x y : R, scal (plus x y) x0 = plus (scal x x0) (scal y x0) linear_scal : forall k x : R, scal (scal k x) x0 = scal k (scal x x0) x1 : R H4 : 0 < x1 H7 : forall x : R, norm (scal x x0) <= x1 * norm x x2 : R H8 : forall x0 : R, is_filter_lim (locally x) x0 -> Equiv.is_domin (locally x) (fun y : R => minus y x0) (fun y0 : R => minus (minus (f y0 y) (f x0 y)) (scal (minus y0 x0) x2)) linear_plus0 : forall x y : R, scal (plus x y) x2 = plus (scal x x2) (scal y x2) linear_scal0 : forall k x : R, scal (scal k x) x2 = scal k (scal x x2) x3 : R H2 : 0 < x3 H9 : forall x : R, norm (scal x x2) <= x3 * norm x Unable to unify "match n with | 0%nat => ?M17009 y = ?M17012 | S n => is_derive (Derive_n ?M17009 n) y ?M17012 end" with "exists l : R_NormedModule, is_derive (fun z : S => g z y) x l".

original: intros f g n x y H1 H2. unfold ex_diff_n in H1. unfold ex_diff_n. destruct H1 as [H1_1 H1_2]. split. - apply continuity_2d_pt_ext_loc with (g:=g) (x:=x) (y:=y); auto. - destruct n. + apply I. + destruct H1_2 as [H1_2_1 [H1_2_2 [H1_2_3 H1_2_4]]]. split. * apply is_derive_n_ext with (f:=fun z : R => f z y) (n:=n) (x:=x); auto. * split. ++ apply is_derive_n_ext with (f:=fun z : R => f x z) (n:=n) (x:=y); auto. ++ split. ** apply H1_2_3. ** apply H1_2_4.
